about_the_game:
Return(溯) is a pixel-style role-playing game with a rich storyline, special partner mechanics, and multiple branching paths. As the designer of the "Kun" aircraft, you will decide the planet's fate through your own hands.

Monsters from Myth

Unlike games that use Western myths as allusions, in "Return(溯)", the monsters players face are based on the ancient Chinese book "The Classic of Mountains and Seas". While exploring this fictional planet in the game, players can also feel the rich imagination of ancient people

Friends?...Or Enemies


Players will encounter multiple characters with different personalities and choose to cooperate or confront them. Each choice may affect the direction of the story.

Attention

Our project is still in preparation, the current display content does not represent the final quality.
The English version will be provided when the game is officially released.

name: Return(溯)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Pentium G +
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: i3 / Ryzen +
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 750 Ti Above
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Return(溯) is a pixel-style role-playing game with a rich storyline, special partner mechanics, and multiple branching paths.
supported_languages: English, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
